Html:
Hi!

Is there a way to find/replace text in excel object using PHPExcel? I've tried googling without any success.

BTW, I must say that PHPExcel is really a great project!!!

Thx in advance!

<input id="gwProxy" type="hidden" /><input id="jsProxy" onclick="jsCall();" type="hidden" />
Well, you can find/replace by manually looping through cells. We don't yet have an automated way to do this in PHPExcel.
